website_summaries.verdict: Bold ink in well-made pens with user-friendly features including sturdy caps and rubber grips.
pros: Customers rave about the rich color of the ink, and how long the pens last
Barrels are see-through, to help keep track of ink levels
Pens have caps and rubberized grips
Available in different bright colors and with fine or medium points
cons: Pens have been known to leak, and the ink has the tendency to smudge if you touch it before it dries
Fine points aren't as smooth to write with as the medium points

customer_reviews.title: You only receive 1 pen!
customer_reviews.text: I placed an order for what I thought was a 12 pack of pens and only received ONE pen. For $6 and some change, I would not have ever considered paying this much for a pen. I know the picture only shows one pen but the description clearly says 12 pack. I am disappointed with this order.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pentel RSVPS are Perfect for Bridal Shower Favors
customer_reviews.text: I bought these purple RSVP pens to use as favors for my friend's bridal shower, and they were perfect. The bride's favorite color is purple. I rolled up some shiny purple foil paper and inserted it inside each pen. I also made some for the bride with black and white paper. The shower guests could use the pens for writing their answers to games, and they each got to take a pen home.
customer_reviews.author: TeNe

customer_reviews.title: Great ink! Easy to hold! My perfect pen!
customer_reviews.text: Best pens ever. Been using them for years, and will keep on using them as long as I can get them. The ink dries immediately, I’ve never had one get gloppy or leak, and the .07 one gives me the fine point for writing while still being solid and perfectly readable. They’re the perfect diameter for my hand, and since I write a lot, that counts for me, no writers cramps. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: J. Marriott

customer_reviews.title: love these pens!
customer_reviews.text: great price at less than $4 for a dozen! we love to give these out as favors or teacher gifts. i gave only 4 stars because each pen has a bar code sticker that you have to remove. but other than that, the pens write smoothly and theyre my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Blaze&Madizen

customer_reviews.title: Great pens
customer_reviews.text: I love these pens! What I don't love is how difficult they are to find. So, I am painfully possessive of them (meaning people will feel the pain if they borrow it without asking or don't return it when borrowing). I love the fine point; it makes it easy to write in small spaces. I love that they last until the ink is gone. I love that they don't ooze ink out the ball, which seams to happen with other pens. I love the grip. And I like the bulkiness of the pen; it makes it easier to hold. Really excellent pen, if only the makes would bring it back!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Color!!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this comes in burgundy!! The school colors for the school that my children attend are burgundy and gold so these pens are perfect!! My children use them for school spirit days to write notes or sign certificates. I am giving boxes of pens to our student board reps since the district colors are also burgundy and gold. The pens are also well made like all the other amazing Pentel RSVP Ball Point Pens. I would also love it in a FINE tip as well!
customer_reviews.author: E. Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Writes smooth; Comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: I'm a writer and go through a lot of pens. I prefer ballpoint pens because they generally write smoother and I'm able to write quicker without any strain. I like these pens because they're a smooth ballpoint that doesn't leave any weird lines, and comes out smooth and evenly. The caps on these pens fit really well so you won't have to worry about the cap coming off in your bag and getting ink everywhere. They come with a rubber grip that makes writing more comfortable, and the circumference of the pen itself makes it comfortable to hold. After I bought these pens they were shipped quickly and arrived in a box. I recommend these pens and the distributor.
customer_reviews.author: Lux

customer_reviews.title: Great pens but barcode sticker is awful
customer_reviews.text: The pens themselves are great. What is truly awful about this purchase is that each individual pen comes with a sticker that has a bar code on it. The sticker does not come off easily, leaving sticky residue. Had I known this I would not have purchased. Not worth my time to return.
customer_reviews.author: Gear User

customer_reviews.title: A great pen ruined by a sticker...
customer_reviews.text: WHAAAAT !!! My favorite pen in a dozen count, and cheaper than anywhere else? What is the downside? Well the down side is the stupid bar code sticker on the pen cap. You can remove the sticker but the sticky residue is something else. I have been very successful with blue Dawn dishwashing detergent and a towel. I put dawn directly on the sticky stuff and a few drops of water and many passes with the towel. This is the best way I have been able to clear the residue...so far.
customer_reviews.author: atti tude

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT THEY USE TO BE
customer_reviews.text: Pentel brand fine point ballpoint pens have been our household favorite brand of pens for at least 20+ years. This value pack caught my eye based on the exceptional history we’ve experienced over the course of time. However, when the pens arrived, they DO NOT perform well at all. The ink dispenses unevenly in clumpy blots while writing. What a huge disappointment! Not sure if it’s a bad batch or a decline in quality. As a result of the Amazon return window having closed, I can’t even try to process a defective return.
customer_reviews.author: Dumpling

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, they aren't what they used to be!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with these pens. I used to brag on them as they were the best! But now they blotch and bleed through my pages as I write. I end up with smears on my pages and on my hand. I contacted them once and was told that if I mailed the pen back to them they would replace it. Yeah, like that's going to happen as it's not cost effective at all. And what could they replace it with but another leaky pen? So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Hope A. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Pen bleeds when writing
customer_reviews.text: My agency has been using this exact pen for several years. The last two orders have been terrible. Pen after pen bleeds when writing. Or whatever you call it. And since writing is my job, the quality of these pens lately have been impacting my work. I didn’t send back the last bad batch of pens but here we go again. They bleed or spot when writing right out of the box. After several years of using this pen it’s now time to find her worthy replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn & DougTop Contributor: Drums

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batch
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to receive these pens; however, they seem like they've been in storage too long. They seemed to skip and now don’t write as smooth as the other Pentel pens I've owned. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: chel2305

customer_reviews.title: Let me tell you..
customer_reviews.text: There was no problem with the seller, packaging or anything of the sort. Just don't like these pens. Got these because I really wanted purple ink roller ball pens, but they are pathetic to hold, I dont feel satisfied with the way the ink comes out. Doesn't make my handwriting look good because of the ink coming out and grip dynamics do not work in my favor. Btw, I am a pen enthusiast and enjoy writing on good quality papers with good quality pens.
customer_reviews.author: Agneel Rajput

customer_reviews.title: Smooth flowing, never a skip or a blot, easy on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: I somehow ended up with a couple of these, don't know how. But they quickly replaced all my other pens for regular use. I used to use only fine-tip pens, but as I've gotten older, I find medium easier to see - and I don't fill page after page with notes as I did in college, I use a computer now for that sort of thing, so I don't need to worry about writing tiny to save paper! Recently I noticed (bless those transparent barrels!) that my ink was starting to get low in both of them. So I got this package of a dozen to make sure I never run out.
customer_reviews.author: KS Granny

customer_reviews.title: (RSVP)Comfort Functional and Lasts long
customer_reviews.text: The shipment came very fast at a great price, even without Amazon Prime they have offers with shipping at no cost The quality of ball point Pentel RSVP opens are fine solid dark inked lines with no airpockets creating the loss of writing ability you usually encounter when you are pressed for time and need a dependable pen to work. It will save you the hassle of rummaging around for the mislead workable pen.Grip is functional and does not slide up or down pen (For those on the road moments)
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Seven

customer_reviews.title: The fine point means less ink is laid down
customer_reviews.text: The fine point means less ink is laid down, but the pink ink still shows up in a pretty way. Best on bright white paper, since the fine line with the lighter color has less impact. I like these pens for journaling. I also purchased Pentel R.S.V.P. Ballpoint Pen, Medium Point, Assorted Ink Colors, 8 Pack (BK91CRBP8M), which I feel is a better set of pens for using on stationery or note cards, since the medium point creates a fuller, richer line of ink on the paper, for better legibility.
customer_reviews.author: SoPA

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy writing
customer_reviews.text: I usually use the medium point version of this pen, but wanted to try the fine point because lately the medium pens bleed more than they used to. The fine point was very "scratchy" to write with - not a pleasant experience. I returned them. I'm back to the medium point, but disappointed the quality has gone down over time and I often end up discarding half the pack to find the pens that won't bleed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Pens are defective
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed. These are my favorite pens and I've ordered them before without any problems. But apparently I have a bad batch of pens. I had a few pens left over from another box. When those ran out, I opened these "new" ones. I used one pen for about an hour and then nothing, like there was no ink in it. But the barrel looked full. Not to mention IT HAD ONLY BEEN AN HOUR! Trashed it, got a second pen. Same thing. Then a third. Ditto. Came here to request a refund but the window closed on in June. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pens for the money and nice fine lines!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 2 pack of these years ago and I loved them. I like the fine lines and that they seem to write in all temptress. I have had the one in 3 different cars and I works perfect when ever I need it. The other one I have been using off and on for sevrral years and its still going strong. They seem to hold a good amount of ink. I know after all the years that they can't last to much longer, so I was glad to see they still make and sell them. So I ordered some and they seem just as good as the originals!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these pens before which was perfect. But this product I received must have been old, or exposed to heat. The ink on in these pens gums up on the roller causing it to smudge and leave uneven strokes while writing. The ink unknowingly transferred to my hand, and I ruined my new cell phone case. Such a bummer that I can no longer return this because I missed the window.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Great Pen
customer_reviews.text: RSVP is my favorite pen, its comfortable to hold and I love the fine pink line when I write. I love that I was able to buy a whole set of them. Usually I buy the multi color set from the store but the pink always runs out because I use it the most then I have to go buy the set all over again to get the one pink pen. Pentel makes great products, this is my absolute favorite and I am happy I have plenty because someone always loves my pen and wants to keep it and now I have extras.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Best pens. Period.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only pens I write with at work. I keep a log of every phone call, and I like the fine point because I can fit more writing in the same space. I can write smaller without it looking cramped. These pens are not too heavy, but have a better feel in my hand than typical pens. They don't leave chunks of ink on the page, and always write smoothly. If I lose one, I will hunt it down, office to office, until I recover it. These are my favorite pens, and I am not above labeling them. I don't even use our free company-branded pens, I only use these pens. I am a pen snob, apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: I love these pens.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these pens for over 20 years. I love the fine point. At work I have to write a lot, the pen is light, very comfy to hold and writes beautifully. The fine point enables me to write in small spaces. My handwriting actually looks better with this pen. The only issue I have is when I go to fax something, it doesn’t show up on the receiving end but hey, that’s what emails are for!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great Pens
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to fill with patterned paper to make small, inexpensive Christmas gifts, and I LOVE the way they write. If you happen to be buying these for the same reason I did, let me give you a tip - thinner paper works best, and it doesn't take much. It took me a bit of practice to get it right, but it's worth it. The barrels are nice and clear, and they write very smoothly. As some have mentioned, the barcode stickers on the caps leave a sticky residue. Rubbing alcohol gets it off, but it's a pain!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Powell

customer_reviews.title: Nice fine line pen but tends to leak a bit
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are a long slim fine line pen. I have used them in the past but was unable to find them till recently. Unfortunately, I forgot how much they leak. I end up with ink smudges all over my hands. They write nice and smooth and have a nice fine line but I am constantly having little blobs of ink that get on my fingers. The only way to avoid it is to wipe the tip before I use them. Other than that, these are still my favorite pens.
customer_reviews.author: bb77

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pen for many years
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pens for years. Signature colors of green & purple. They don’t leave heavy ink marks, very smooth and consistent writers. Don’t have to scribble circles to get ink to flow, doesn’t leave ink on fingers. Just a good, all around ink pen.
customer_reviews.author: MTEK

customer_reviews.title: Great pens
customer_reviews.text: Compared to Bic Cristal ballpoints (another favorite of mine) the Pentel RSVP lasts longer and writes more smoothly + with less skipping, so I'd say it's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: been using these brands since high school. the fine tip work great for writing in small spots. they fine tips to smudge a tiny bit. the medium ones done smug and still work great from some small areas. was a little bummed though because my box and 1 pen in there that was completely empty. no ink was ever put into it. even with that said it'll still order again because these pens work great in the nursing field.
customer_reviews.author: Crista

customer_reviews.title: Black ink in a purple pen!
customer_reviews.text: I actually love these pens. I am a teacher and I use them to grade my papers. I was disappointed with this box however. I needed a new pen so I took out the second to last wonderful purple pen. When I used it, it was writing in black ink! It had a purple end and purple grip and came in a box of purple pens, but it was black ink! Luckily I had one more pen left in the box so I could finish grading my stack of papers. This might seem stupid to some, but I was extremely frustrated! Otherwise, I would give them 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: However
customer_reviews.text: I love these pens & was happy to find them at such a great price. However, I didn’t notice that these are labeled for individual sale so each pen has a sku sticker on the lid. These stickers do not come off easily & they leave adhesive behind. Maybe the skus won’t bother you, but I don’t like them. It’s going to take a lot of peeling & goo gone to get rid of them. :(
customer_reviews.author: ctrichard

customer_reviews.title: Fine lines and writes smooth but ink leaks horribly
customer_reviews.text: I love how fine these are and how smooth they write when they actually work. I either get a dry spot when I'm writing where nothing comes out for an entire line or the ink leaks and I won't even realize its all over my hand. I'm not sure if I got a faulty pack or what they've started slacking on the quality but I've used these for years and never had issues. I probably won't repurchase because I had to throw more away than I could actually fully use.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: leaky and very short lived.
customer_reviews.text: i love the way these pens write, but they are so delicate or something... they always split their ink cartridge and the ink leaks out into the barrel of the pen, and then out of the pen. maybe it's only if you try to carry them in your bag pocket and they get banged up? maybe i need a pencil case.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: All around best ballpoint for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Classic Pentel, good sized grip (even with arthritis) good ink flow and can see how much is left, no blots like cheaper ball points, but still decent price, nice feel on all kinds of paper. I have used these for years so can also say the ink doesn’t fade over time. Refills are available too, makes the price even lower. I’ve tried lots of pens, these are the ones I always come back to.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Edwards

customer_reviews.title: These pens used to be free for usage at my work years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Then, they removed them and replaced our pens with cheap crap. I am so glad I found these because I purchase them for both home and work use. These are the best pens I believe I have ever used. I also have purchased the fine point pens of this brand for puzzles and other smaller writing areas. If I ever hear they are going to quit making these, I'll buy the lot!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CharlieCat

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I have very bad RA in my hands and I am unable to hold a regular pen. With these pens I am able to write my grocery lists, and sign my name. Sometimes it is the little things that count.
customer_reviews.author: Larry F.

customer_reviews.title: Writes Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: No need for me to complain because I love these ink pens. The only problem is I don’t like is when they leak. I buy them by the box so I never run out. I have never got a box that didn’t have at least one or two pens that will leak ink on my hands and sometimes on my scrubs before I even noticed, but I continue to buy them because I love how they write.
customer_reviews.author: Flyby711

customer_reviews.title: ink flow is great and each pen last a long time
customer_reviews.text: I've used these pens for years as an RN to do my charting. Now, even with medical records going to computerized, I still use only these pens. They write very well, ink flow is great and each pen last a long time, even with heavy use. I've tried the popular "G" brand everyone seems to rave about, but I came right back to the RSVPs. I'll always use these for as long as they are made. It is a quality pen.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy64

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love a purple pen?
customer_reviews.text: I love the purple ink. And use them all the time as they write really nice. The only negative is that the ink does "bleed" on things you've written with it a long time ago. Found some old journals and notes from a few years back and the ink was smeared and bled through the other side of the paper. It didn't matter. I still love my purple pens.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: When the pandemic forced me to work from home, I found myself suddenly without my favorite pen and was surprised to find how it added to my stress. It was so comforting to get a box of these and know that I could write smoothly and clearly again. It never skips, always writes smoothly, and lasts a long time. I hope they make these forever.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the worst set of pens I've ever recieved. They don't write. I love this brand as I've used them in the past but it seems that I got a bad batch as whenever I'm trying to write something the ink goes in and out and I have to be retracing what I write constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Kemdon

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Pen
customer_reviews.text: My very favorite ink pen. Well made and fits in your hand great. Ink flows easily and without blobs. Fine point, it's a joy to write with this instrument. Being no longer sold in my area's stores---I was delighted to find this pen available on Amazon. Pentel makes great pens and also have this pen in green, blue, red and purple.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lynn Hurst Riley

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: Let me start out by saying these are my favorite pens. BUT...for some reason the package that I got was a huge disappointment. All the pens each ran out of ink very quickly. You could still see the ink in the pen, but they just stopped writing. Huge disappointment. Never had a problem with these pens when purchased at the store. Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Spots when it writes
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what changed in the pens, but they leave little spots of ink that smear if you rub a hand across the paper to soon. I've used these pens for years, but had to switch for a while because the office said the writing was too "fine", so I switched to a thicker ball point. When they were permitted again, I bought these, but I find if I'm not careful, I get several smudges and smears on my sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Pen
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I feel a little funny writing a review for a pen. However, this isn't just any pen. It's been my favorite pen for years. I stupidly left mine in my pants pocket and washed it, so it broke. I was devastated. Then I decided to replace it. It's just that good. I'm glad that I have two now. I'm really fond of the purple ink. It doesn't smudge and I'm a lefty. That says a lot.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pens, Great value and Price!!
customer_reviews.text: I take lots of notes and need to write fast. This is the only pen in the world so far that allows me to write quickly and still have a elegant legable penmanship. Very smooth effortless glid thrpough any surface with minimal pressure on your fingers and wrist! Seller is very puctual with delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: blueskies

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, smooth and produce clear handwriting.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these pens for years and they're still my FAVORITE pens. The ink dries well, it doesn't smudge, the fine point is thin, and most importantly, it writes amazingly smoothly. I'm a little weird and particular about which pens I use and these are the pens I use if I expect to write a lot and at a fast pace. They're comfortable, smooth and produce clear handwriting.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: I brought one but the green color before and I really liked it. However, the pen is kind of lumpy with you write with it and there is like a build up of ink when I am writing. Overall, the pen is smooth but the ink build up is kind of annoying. And yes, that happened to all of the pens that I got in the package so it must have been the product itself. I would probably spend my money on better quality pens but this is manageable (I guess).
customer_reviews.author: Lena Liu

customer_reviews.title: Best pens ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these Pentel pens for probably 15 years. Maybe longer. I used my last one a few weeks ago & wasn’t able to find them anywhere locally. So happy I found them on Amazon. I love the way they feel in my hand. I like that the cap comes off & fits on the end of the pen while you’re using it. Best pen ever.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite pens and I use them all the time for work. I hate that I tend to misplace them or other nurses will take then. They feel great, write amazing, and they are light weight. I love that you can buy them by the dozen. I bought 3 dozens just because I like them so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adonis Veliz

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth writing surface
customer_reviews.text: These pens are very smooth to write with, I like the size of the barrel, they aren't super thin so easy to hold with neuropathy in the hands and fingers. The pink is a very vibrant pink and looks pink, not a strange shade of red. Great for Breast Cancer Awareness or just to have pink !
customer_reviews.author: JenWill

customer_reviews.title: Write Me
customer_reviews.text: The Pentel, RSVP pen is one of the best writing ball point pens that I have ever used. I purchased the 1mm because it was the largest ball that I could find. They consider this a Medium. There are times when I have to use a ball point instead of a Gel. These pens do the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: WhatMeThinks

customer_reviews.title: I'm extremely disappointed in the performance of this product purchased at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Pentel pens, preferably purple ink. I purchased the pens in late February and have already used 4 of them til they will not write!! This is unacceptable, as I do not use them that often!! The Pentel pens I have purchased in the past, at other stores have always lasted a very long time!! I'm extremely disappointed in the performance of this product purchased at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: holly j ralph

customer_reviews.title: great pens
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite pens to grade students' works as they are not red but distinct enough from blue or black. I've been using these pens for years as I like their comfortable grip and thickness. I'm glad I was able to find them here as finding them in stores becomes increasingly difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Best medium point ball point pen!
customer_reviews.text: I'm obessed with these pens. I've been using them for over 15 years now and yes, you can say they're my favorite. The ink is great and doesn't dry out on it, so you're able to use it down all the way until it runs out of ink. The color doesn't smear or spread. I love how long the pen is, it's clear so you can see the ink level to know when you're running out. I wish they were the clicky pens so you don't have to risk losing the cap on it, but overall the pen itself writes great. It's a ball point pen and writes so smoothe. I would repurchase and purchase these whenever I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine

customer_reviews.title: Almost life changing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worlds most comfortable pen!! So comfortable that I almost wrote out thank you notes...and happy birthday cards....and anniversary cards....and some missing you notecards....and some journal pages....but then I just grabbed some ice cream and messed around on my phone like normal.
customer_reviews.author: Sar

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice writing fine point pens. They look more expensive than they are. The grip is comfortable and is something only pricier pens have. I prefer these over Bic because they are a thicker pen with a grip. I also think fine point pens give a neater script.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I thought initially that these were harder to write with but either I have gotten used to them or they can miraculously gotten easier to write with. Either way, I like these pens. They glide well and don't take a lot of pressure to get the ink flowing which I really appreciate since I write a lot.
customer_reviews.author: farout

customer_reviews.title: Always a reliable pen
customer_reviews.text: First time trying the fine tip variety of this favorite pen. The ink is smooth and flows well with no skipping. Delivers a fine line for writing and especially useful for accounting use with numbers. The top closes with a nice secure "snap". Great price here.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ro

customer_reviews.title: I love love love these pens! Left-handed Approved!
customer_reviews.text: These pens are some of my favorites. I remember my teachers always having them and always wondering why they preferred them, but now I understand! They are the perfect weight, they are easy to hold and control, they preform well when doodling or writing, and best of all, as a left handed person they dont smudge! I absolutely love!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: In Praise of a Ballpoint Pen
customer_reviews.text: I sing songs about the Pentel RSVP. I write hymns about them, and I play my hymns on the giant pipe organ at church. Occasionally, a few people attending my Pentel Pipe Organ concerts start speaking in tongues, and they roll around under the pews grinning from ear to ear. I use my flute to charm Cobra snakes with my mesmerizing Pentel melodies. My Pentel tunes cannot be forgotten by any person who's heard them. And you will hear these same tunes in your head when you first use a Pentel RSVP ballpoint pen.
customer_reviews.author: hugh parker

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy. Find another distributor/seller.
customer_reviews.text: I love these pens and how fine they write which is why I ordered an entire box. For some reason these pens start bleeding out of no where. Not just one but all of them. After a few times of use I look down and will have ink all over my hand with large amounts of ink coming from the tip. Do not order this pen. Not sure if I just received and entire defective box of pens but the odds of that seem less than it just being a few.
customer_reviews.author: Kie

customer_reviews.title: Not as I expected
customer_reviews.text: The tip of the pen does not sharp enough to me. I used to buy from Walmart and the ball head was fine enough for me to write. The color is not dark enough to read. These pens on Amazon are bigger. I thought it was same pens cuz the brand and look were same. Too bad I can’t find it at Walmart anymore. Pros: write smoothly Cons: tip not sharp enough for me. The green color is not darker enough, so it is hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: Sambun Mao

customer_reviews.title: Good Pens for Empty Nesting
customer_reviews.text: After stealing these pens from my daughter over the course of her 18 years at home, I realized during empty nesting that I needed to buy some for my very own, since my supply had been cut off. Sad, but I felt that they were a good memory of her and made me feel connected to her when she was away. i love to write in my journal about empty nesting with these pens.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Onimous

customer_reviews.title: I used mine for 2 days and it was perfect, but the ink stopped working all of a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've read other reviews stating that the ink tends to stop working even when it was hardly used. I was hesitant to buy this pen, but did anyway. I used mine for 2 days and it was perfect, but the ink stopped working all of a sudden and even with scribbling and trying any other method I could think of, it still would not work. There is so much ink left and it doesn't look like it has even been used. I wonder if it's just too old because I've never experienced that with these pens before. Regret buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kayce Fang

customer_reviews.title: Who reviews a pen?
customer_reviews.text: Well, apparently I do. I have been using these pens for a while now and they write incredibly smooth. Not to mention that they are very easy to hold because they are a bit wider than other pens and have a grip on them. These are great if you are a "note-taker" like me and if you need to write really fast or all the time. Generally, these are really good pens.
customer_reviews.author: amazonfaithful

customer_reviews.title: Not a True Medium Point!
customer_reviews.text: These used to be my favorite pens back in 2004, however their "Medium Point" isn't a true Medium anymore - they all seem to be Fine points marked AS medium now. It's really frustrating because I have large handwriting & I like a thicker line. You can't find the BLUE Mediums in office supply stores anymore either, which is why I had to get them online. Guess I'll have to go back to Bic's Paper Mates ~ Ah well... you're loss Pentel, not mine!
customer_reviews.author: One Hope 4 Heaven

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY pen I've used since 1996!!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite writing utensil since 1996! They can be a challenge to find in a store, but fortunately they're abundant online. The fine point (vs. medium) is the way to go - crisp, even lines that flow smoothly from this pen to end all pens. I keep four with me at all times: one black, one blue, one red, and one purple (or green if I can find it). I hope Pentel never retires this model!!
customer_reviews.author: Bradford LeHew

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: It's a pen. Nothing special. It DOES leave ink bubbles every other word. Quite annoying because the writing is uneven. I suppose you could say that for the price it's pretty good but I'm not saying that. I would not buy it again and so my search continues for the perfect pen.
customer_reviews.author: stefan vladescu

customer_reviews.title: pens died
customer_reviews.text: I have tried about 4-5 pens out of this box and they were dried out, super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. E.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves blobs of ink on the paper
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed in these pens. They write nicely and are comfortable to hold, but they leave blobs of ink on the paper, which then smears if you touch it. I bought them for journaling, and you can see the spots of ink on the other side of the page. Also, if turn the page before it's dry, it smears. I won't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Holland

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Pens
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved these pens. They write smooth with little pressure. They're sleek and look nice. They're inexpensive so stocking up is easy so you never run out. The ink lasts a good while and doesn't smudge once dry in a couple seconds. They're a great quality and I'm never without one wherever I go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A smooth pen for its price
customer_reviews.text: I've lost several fancy red pens during the past couple of years. I bought this box for it's cheap and I can afford to lose them. Surprisingly, this one feels not bad. Still, keep to the better models if you don't have a habit of losing pens.
customer_reviews.author: Tianyi

customer_reviews.title: I was tired of buying pens locally that did not work, or fell apart.  These work beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: I was out of pens at my house, and could not buy anything locally that did not fall apart , or write decently. These work great and write beautifully. Ink also dries quickly, which is great for a left handed person, like me.
customer_reviews.author: tmejfan

customer_reviews.title: Gotta try these! Fine point is my favorite. The black n blue ink are great for school!
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve never tried these Pens.... you must! I like the fine point. The Black ink is a must have. The Blue n green fine point are my favorite colors to write with! The quality is amazing, I only use these pens! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jgills5

customer_reviews.title: I have been using one of these pens for several years
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid my pen would run out of ink and decided to see if they are still sold -- and YES they are. I have been using my current pen for several years and it still works well. I use it for my home bookkeeping. Great pen at great price.
customer_reviews.author: capricorn60us

customer_reviews.title: Nice fine point, does leak and soak through some paper, though.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Pentel R.S.V. P. Fine Line ballpoint pens. They are all great but do leak/splotch a little bit. The purple, in particular, really bleeds through thin paper (especially test prep workbooks, which I annotate all the time) and over time, the purple does fade to pink. Green seems to be more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Berlin Ishii

customer_reviews.title: Pentel R.S.V.P.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this pen for anyone who writes a lot and wants an even flow of ink with no skipping of the ink and that writes very smooth across the page with ease. It has been a very long time since i found such a pen. Some pens say fine print when in fact that has never been the case. This pen delivers, it is easy to hold because i write a lot on genealogy, the price is perfect, and it is very comfortable to hold while writing. yours Truly Eileen Hamilton.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Purple Ink Pen
customer_reviews.text: If you LOVE PURPLE! These pens are a must have. They are very fine point and do not ink blob at all! I wish there were refills available for these so that they don’t go to a landfill when ink runs out. That part makes me sad!
customer_reviews.author: Moosekiss

customer_reviews.title: I love pens and I am not sure why
customer_reviews.text: I love pens and I am not sure why, lol but I buy them often especially Pental. I use to use fine point a lot but I do appreciate Medium point now more. Received them, they work well, there is a sticky piece of tape around each individual pen, but this was not a big issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: pina3470

customer_reviews.title: Her writing is not the best and she writes a lot so the precision of ...
customer_reviews.text: My sister is obsessed with these pens. Every year for Christmas she would request for these and I would buy for her to keep her stocked for the rest of the year. These pens write well, do not bleed and last for some time. Her writing is not the best and she writes a lot so the precision of these pens help keep it clean and easy to understand. Or maybe the pens makes her feel fancy and she takes time to write. Whatever it is, it's working. I would take out two for myself and wrap up the rest. So far no complaint about the missing pens...
customer_reviews.author: Angel Chau

customer_reviews.title: Loving Purple!
customer_reviews.text: I love purple, so these pens work great for me. No leaking and smooth writing. Update 9-20-18: Yes, the pens continue to write smoothly, BUT I'm experiencing some leaking with the medium point. I ordered the fine point purple hoping for not leaking. Update: 10-6-18: Fine point purple so far no leaking. Still using medium point purple and learned that storing them flat in a desk drawer better than pencil holder means less leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Reader-fan

customer_reviews.title: "I Love How Smooth They Write," Says My Wife
customer_reviews.text: These pens wrote beautifully from the moment my wife pulled them out the package. They are nice size with a cushioned band which is a necessity for my wife's RA riddled hands. "I love how smooth they write," is a direct quote from her as I just asked her about them for this review.
customer_reviews.author: By CJs Pirate

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Pen for Over 20 Years
customer_reviews.text: Absolute favorite pen for years. Saw the pics here on Amazon about using colored paper rolled inside and thought "wow! Perfect for allowing kids to personalize their pens!" They love it and no more fighting over whose is whose!
customer_reviews.author: J&amp;R's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Best pens
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the only pens I keep in the house. May sound strange but I hate blue ink and I’m picky about my pens. These have a good grip, write easily, and you can’t beat the price. I’ve even taken my husband to the pen snob side
customer_reviews.author: matthew morton

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pens EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these pens, especially for the price. they are so smooth to write with and i especially love the look of the pen. These are a quality pen that will for sure last you a long time. But if you write with them as often as i do they may run out of ink in a timely fashion! I have to say these are my favorite pens and are my go-to. Id recumbent these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Yali

customer_reviews.title: Great pens for the office!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sleek feel of these pens- they are great for the office. They don't bleed like some gel pens do. Have a nice, soft line. Very smooth and comfortable. A great value- I would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: A hospital favourite
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: do not leave unattended, because someone WILL steal it if you leave it unattended. I work in a hospital and people are always stealing pens if their owners aren't next to them. They write excellently.
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Best pen ever used - inexpensive - best value pen
customer_reviews.text: The Pentel RSVP is the best pen I have ever used. Happened upon them 5 years ago and purchase my own pens for work so that I can have them. Inexpensive, writes great, writes until it is completely empty, easy to carry. Carry 2 in my pocket all the time and have yet to have one explode on me. I think writes better than a gel pen, but it is not a gel pen. Just purchased another 2 boxes (everyone at work borrows them and they do not come back).
customer_reviews.author: Coach in Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Poor Dispensing Ink Pen
customer_reviews.text: Pen ink doesn't write smoothly. Pen ink skips; so irritating and not "pretty on the paper". Seriously, we can put astronauts on the moon; hence, how difficult can it be to design and make an inexpensive ball-point pen with ink that dispenses smoothly without skipping? My review. Paula T.
customer_reviews.author: bounce

customer_reviews.title: The best fine line pen in my book as a left hander
customer_reviews.text: As a lefty I prefer fine pens as there is always a risk for smudging. These pens are a lifesaver and my penmanship always looks better using an RSVP pen. Check them out. They are all I used in college for note taking, and still a favorite years later.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: The feel of the pen is great; poor quality ink. Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the poor quality ink. The ink is not dark enough. It was similar on all the pens. The pen itself feels nice in the hand but I did not like the quality of the ink. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Go Seahawks!

customer_reviews.title: Love the color. Didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: The color is nice & bright as expected. They're smooth to write with. I'd say good quality ... for a limited time. Each pen has exploded one by one & gotten purple ink everywhere. Other pens that I carry aren't exploding like these are.
customer_reviews.author: TEESH

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pen!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only pens I really enjoy using as they've been my pen of choice for over a decade. I like the fine point and smooth writing performance. The rubber around the finger position makes it very comfortable to use. We have about six available on our office desk at any one time. Occasionally, we'll find one that's been around for a very long time and the rubber begins to stretch to the point that it interferes with putting the cap on, but that isn't that often. I was very pleased to find a 12 pack available-much more economical than the usual four or five pack.
customer_reviews.author: Rgk-553

customer_reviews.title: Writes Great! Love the fine tip!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pens. I use them at work and at home. The only thing I do not like is that they occasionally blotch and smear, I often need to take a tissue to clean it off the tip before writing to avoid the blotches of ink on the tip of the pen. I love the fine tip more than the medium tip.
customer_reviews.author: Kellen

customer_reviews.title: Very picky about my pens
customer_reviews.text: R.S.V.P. Is my favorite type pen. Normally I would just buy them at Walmart or somewhere but I searched my whole town looking for the md and no one has them for whatever reason so Amazon saves the day and cheaper also.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it was...but
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was purchasing the click type pen but it wasn't. That's the only and main problem and that's my fault, not the sellers. As far as the pen itself, I love the fine point and how it writes.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Iron

customer_reviews.title: Just lacking one thing..
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite pens, nice fine line that is fluid and smooth. My four star review is for the full pack because they give you two pencils and two large erasers that you’ll probably never use up but no extra led.. they could take out one eraser and give you a pack of led for the pencils then it would be a 5 star pack ;)
customer_reviews.author: 7beaz

customer_reviews.title: PINK PENS YAY!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these pens. I looked for PINK RSVP pens in retail stores and was disappointed that I couldn't find any and look and behold here they were the whole time. These pens fit in my Cricut Explorer pen sleeve and to find the PINK ones for a new business venture was a must and to have an entire box instead of 1 or 2 has been amazing. I'm able to use them in my office, in my purse, in my car etc. I will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Best pens.
customer_reviews.text: I forgot about these pens until I stole a red one and rekindled my love. I immediately bought a pack of these. Best pens for school work. The pencils are new to me, but worked great for frantic essay writing on exams. I wish they had more colors in the fine tip.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

product_meta.title: Pentel BK90A R.S.V.P. Stick Ballpoint Pen, .7mm, Trans Barrel, Black Ink (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description: Size:Box of 12| Style:0.7mm Fine Point| Color:BlackFeatures a Latex-free Comfort Zone grip for exceptional balance, comfort, and control. Stainless steel tip provides extended durability. Dark, vivid ink to really make your mark! Writes smooth lines of consistent density. Conveniently refillable with Pentel BKL7 fine refills.
feature_bullets: A smooth writing pen that writes for almost a mile without skipping
Sturdy, well-balanced barrel makes this a favorite pen
No matter what size hand you have, the long barrel makes this pen exceptionally easy to use
Durable tip delivers a consistent line without skipping
See how much ink you have through the transparent barrel
Escape writing fatigue with our latex-free Comfort Zone grip

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars5,771 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
